title: Worker Fall from Scaffold
description: A worker fell approximately 6 feet from scaffold while installing drywall. The scaffold was missing proper guardrails.
injury_details: Worker sustained a sprained ankle and bruised shoulder. Treated at St. Mary's Hospital and released the same day with 3 days of restricted duty.
root_cause: Improper scaffold assembly and missing guardrails. Pre-shift inspection was not conducted properly.
corrective_actions: All scaffolds on site have been inspected and deficiencies corrected. Refresher training on scaffold safety conducted for all workers.
preventative_measures: Implemented additional scaffold inspection checkpoints. Updated pre-shift inspection form with scaffold-specific items.

title: Electrical Shock Incident
description: Electrician received mild shock while working on a junction box that was incorrectly labeled as de-energized.
injury_details: Mild electrical shock to right hand. Worker was evaluated on-site by first aid team, no further medical treatment required.

title: Near Miss - Falling Object
description: A hammer fell from the second floor, narrowly missing a worker below. No barricades were in place to prevent access to the area below overhead work.
corrective_actions: Immediate stop-work called to secure all tools. Area below overhead work properly barricaded.

title: Chemical Spill in Storage Area
description: A 5-gallon container of concrete sealer was knocked over during inventory movement, resulting in a spill in the chemical storage area.
root_cause: Improper storage of chemical containers. Containers were stacked too high without proper securing mechanism.
corrective_actions: Spill contained and cleaned up according to SDS procedures. Storage racks reorganized with proper securing mechanisms.
preventative_measures: Updated chemical storage procedures. Conducted training on proper handling and storage of chemicals.

title: Equipment Malfunction - Tower Crane
description: Tower crane experienced unexpected alarm and automatic shutdown during lifting operation. Load was safely lowered prior to shutdown.
root_cause: Sensor malfunction in the crane's overload protection system triggered a false alarm.
corrective_actions: Crane inspection conducted by certified technician. Faulty sensor replaced and system recalibrated.
preventative_measures: Additional pre-operational checks added to daily crane inspection.

title: Struck By incident at Harvard university campus 1
description: Vehicle backed into scaffold structure causing partial collapse. No injuries but equipment damage occurred.

title: Environmental incident at Harvard university campus 1
description: Chemical spill occurred in storage area. Approximately 2 gallons of paint thinner spilled. Area was contained and cleaned according to protocol.
root_cause: Investigation determined that the incident was caused by equipment failure
preventative_measures: To prevent recurrence: Daily equipment inspections

title: Fall incident at Harvard university campus 1
description: Worker slipped on wet floor where caution sign was not placed after mopping.

title: Equipment Failure incident at Harvard university campus 1
description: Electrical short in temporary wiring caused small fire. Fire was extinguished with nearby extinguisher. No structural damage.
injury_details: Worker received minor injury requiring first aid.
root_cause: Investigation determined that the incident was caused by equipment failure
preventative_measures: To prevent recurrence: Improved signage installed

title: Slip/Trip incident at Harvard university campus 1
description: Heavy equipment operator reported near-miss with pedestrian worker who entered operational zone without authorization.
injury_details: Worker received minor injury requiring first aid.

description: Excavation wall partially collapsed during heavy rain. No workers were in the trench at the time.
root_cause: Investigation determined that the incident was caused by environmental factors
